traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. {PAWN_pronoun} can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. {PAWN_pronoun} is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is exceptionally kind. {PAWN_pronoun} has a special way of using kind words to brighten someone's day. {PAWN_pronoun} never insults others, and never judges people by their appearance.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother {PAWN_objective} at all. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, {PAWN_pronoun} tried it... and {PAWN_pronoun} liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} always says exactly what's on {PAWN_possessive} mind, especially if it's bugging {PAWN_objective}. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is too smart for {PAWN_possessive} own good. {PAWN_pronoun} learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes to fight up close and personal. {PAWN_possessive} accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but {PAWN_pronoun}'ll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, there's something exciting about getting hurt. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't know why, {PAWN_pronoun}'s just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description:
{PAWN_nameDef} likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

{PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

{PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} needs a really impressive bedroom. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get what {PAWN_pronoun} wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. {PAWN_pronoun} will become unhappy if if {PAWN_pronoun} has a bedroom that's too impressive. {PAWN_pronoun} also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. {PAWN_pronoun} never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically attracted to people of {PAWN_possessive} own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically attracted to both men and women.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and {PAWN_pronoun} tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike {PAWN_objective}.
traits.name: annoyingvoice

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepybreathing

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves fire. {PAWN_pronoun} will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, {PAWN_pronoun} will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if {PAWN_possessive} mood is low.
traits.name: pyromaniac

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize {PAWN_objective}.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. {PAWN_pronoun} seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a knack for learning. {PAWN_pronoun} picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is slow on the uptake. {PAWN_pronoun} learns much slower than others.
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no need to experience the outdoors or light. {PAWN_pronoun} will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long {PAWN_pronoun} stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels limited in {PAWN_possessive} feeble human body. {PAWN_pronoun} often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
traits.name: transhumanist

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes the human body is limited for a reason. To {PAWN_objective}, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a fantastic memory for detail. {PAWN_pronoun} will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. {PAWN_pronoun} takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. {PAWN_pronoun} is extremely hard to kill.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. {PAWN_pronoun} will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
traits.name: torturedartist

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s life revolves around food. {PAWN_pronoun} gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether {PAWN_pronoun}'s sleeping on a bed or on the ground, {PAWN_pronoun} will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is always falling behind the group whenever [PAWN_pronoun] goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to be where [PAWN_pronoun]'s going. [PAWN_pronoun] walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalfascination

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalinterest

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. [PAWN_pronoun] strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is just naturally upbeat about [PAWN_possessive] situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get [PAWN_objective] down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is perenially unhappy. [PAWN_pronoun] has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s will is an iron shield. [PAWN_pronoun] keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is on a hair-trigger all the time. [PAWN_pronoun] is the first to break in any tough situation.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to have things squared away. [PAWN_pronoun] will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can get the better of [PAWN_objective].
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. [PAWN_pronoun] will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can easily get the better of [PAWN_objective].
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loves idleness and hates anything productive. [PAWN_pronoun] moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is like a psychic tuning fork. [PAWN_pronoun] is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallysensitive

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is psychically out of tune with others. [PAWN_pronoun] isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydull

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. [PAWN_pronoun] just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] takes more time to aim when shooting. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! [PAWN_nameDef] just likes pulling the trigger. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to [PAWN_objective] before [PAWN_pronoun] even opens [PAWN_possessive] mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like [PAWN_objective].
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is staggeringly ugly. [PAWN_possessive] face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at [PAWN_objective] while conversing.
traits.name: staggeringlyugly

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a naturally powerful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an awful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
traits.name: xenophobe

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s faith is firm. It allows {PAWN_objective} to move under any circumstances.
traits.name: faith

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a frail back so [PAWN_pronoun] can't carry as much as the average person.
traits.name: frailback

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a strong back which allows [PAWN_objective] to carry more than most people.
traits.name: strongback

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a very strong back or is part mule or something. [PAWN_pronoun] can carry twice as much as a normal person.
traits.name: verystrongback

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a passion for animals. [PAWN_pronoun] gets bonuses to all animal interactions.
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is still human, mostly. [PAWN_pronoun] is immune to the effects of toxic fallout but their ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.
traits.name: ghoulish

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
traits.name: radresistant

traits.description: There's no time to waste! [PAWN_nameDef] has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actionboy

traits.description: There's no time to waste! [PAWN_nameDef] has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actiongirl

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has quick hands. When it comes to [PAWN_possessive] hands, [PAWN_nameDef] never hesitates.
traits.name: quickhands

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] isn't stupid! [PAWN_pronoun] is just... different. [PAWN_pronoun] learns twice as fast but works slower than normal, [PAWN_pronoun] is also incapable handling some tasks.
traits.name: idiotsavant

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a charismatic personality. [PAWN_pronoun] gets bonuses to all human-like social interactions.
traits.name: charismatic

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a very charismatic personality. [PAWN_pronoun] gets bonuses to all human-like social interactions.
traits.name: verycharismatic

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a gun nut, [PAWN_pronoun] loves guns. [PAWN_pronoun] gets a mood bonus while holding a ranged weapon.
traits.name: gunnut

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is part tree! [PAWN_pronoun] can really take a beating!
traits.name: rooted

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an intimidating personality, this gives [PAWN_objective] an advantage in social interactions.
traits.name: intimidating

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a very intimidating personality, this gives [PAWN_objective] a big advantage in social interactions.
traits.name: veryintimidating

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at working with scrap metal. [PAWN_pronoun] is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials.
traits.name: scrapper

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] seems to discover hidden wealth where ever [PAWN_pronoun] goes.
traits.name: fortunefinder

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has poor hand-eye coordination and will miss [PAWN_possessive] target more often in combat.
traits.name: pooraim

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has great hand-eye coordination and will miss [PAWN_possessive] target less often in combat.
traits.name: steadyaim

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has good reflexes and moves with finesse. [PAWN_pronoun] will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: agile

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has great reflexes and moves like a ninja. [PAWN_pronoun] will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: ninja-like

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] isn't very smart. [PAWN_pronoun] can mess up doing just about anything.
traits.name: stupid

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is smarter than average. [PAWN_pronoun] learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around [PAWN_objective].
traits.name: intelligent

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is very smart. [PAWN_pronoun] learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around [PAWN_objective].
traits.name: veryintelligent

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] isn't very aware of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings, or anything at all really. [PAWN_pronoun]
traits.name: oblivious

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a good awareness of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings and has a good understanding of how [PAWN_possessive] actions affects others.
traits.name: perceptive

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is very aware of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings and has a great understanding of how [PAWN_possessive] actions affects others.
traits.name: veryperceptive

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly.
traits.name: scrounger

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has good health and an enduring personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is better at handling stressful situations than others.
traits.name: enduring

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has exceptional health and a very enduring personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is capable of handling high stress situations that others cannot.
traits.name: veryenduring

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is confident that everything will work out for the best.
traits.name: confident

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is seriously overweight. {PAWN_pronoun} moves slowly, and works even slower.
traits.name: overweight

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has honed {PAWN_possessive} mind and body for most of {PAWN_possessive} life.
traits.name: athletic

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} demonstrates neat skill, especially with {PAWN_possessive} hands.
traits.name: dexterous

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a keen eye, and can quickly spot a target.
traits.name: perceptive

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is fastidious to a fault.
traits.name: clean
stats: -50.00% Food poison chance (chance to poison a meal)

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a hard time seeing things clearly unless {PAWN_pronoun} is relatively close to it.
traits.name: near-sighted

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has always picked up skills pretty quickly.
traits.name: quicklearner

traits.description: Some people use a spoon to eat. {PAWN_nameDef} uses a shovel...
traits.name: glutton

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is good at persuading someone to do or believe something through reasoning or the use of temptation.
traits.name: persuasive

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} could sleep through an earthquake.
traits.name: heavysleeper

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is an extreme pervert. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind sharing a room, or streaking. It makes others feel incredibly uncomfortable.
traits.name: pervert

traits.description: Ashes to ashes and dust to dust. {PAWN_nameDef} is fascinated by corpses and decay.
traits.name: morbid

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} takes medicine very seriously. {PAWN_pronoun} wants to do no harm and isn't afraid to take longer to do the job right.
traits.name: carefulsurgeon

traits.description: Sometimes it's hard to tell where the knife stops and {PAWN_nameDef} starts. People like to say that "if it bleeds {PAWN_nameDef} can skin it and split it".
traits.name: naturalbutcher

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is loved by animals, but people don't feel quite the same.
traits.name: lovedbyanimals

traits.description: Strange new ideas just appear in the mind of {PAWN_nameDef}. Researching new technology comes easily to {PAWN_nameDef}, but {PAWN_pronoun} always seems distracted.
traits.name: geniusinventor

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a passion for gardening. {PAWN_pronoun} knows exactly what a plant needs to grow happily.
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't like to waste materials. {PAWN_pronoun} takes great care in {PAWN_possessive} work.
traits.name: efficientbuilder

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} knows how to exploit the cleavage of rocks. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't understand why plants are so much more fragile though.
traits.name: fastminer

traits.description: They say a sucker is born every minute, and {PAWN_nameDef} is that sucker.
traits.name: sucker

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes to haggle. {PAWN_pronoun} gets better prices than most people.
traits.name: amateurhaggler

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} always gets the best deals - so much so that others often fail to realize they're being duped.
traits.name: hagglingenthusiast

traits.description: The elephant in the room is named {PAWN_nameDef}.
traits.name: awkward

traits.description: "That's a lotta graves. Lotta holes to fill. Bow-Chicka-Bow-Wow" - {PAWN_nameDef}, probably.
traits.name: tucker

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} could talk for days on end and people would still listen to that sweet voice.
traits.name: melodicvoice

traits.description: Subtle is the game of diplomacy, and subtle, {PAWN_nameDef} is not.
traits.name: uncouth

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.
traits.name: diplomatic

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has such a way with {PAWN_objective} words and gifts that {PAWN_pronoun} always manages to cool down a tense situation.
traits.name: verydiplomatic

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has never held a gun in {PAWN_objective} hands. The weight of the cold metal in {PAWN_objective} hands makes {PAWN_pronoun} shudder uncontrollably.
traits.name: shootingamateur

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} knows {PAWN_objective} way with a gun.
traits.name: shootingenthusiast

traits.description: "My rifle is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life." - {PAWN_nameDef}, probably.
traits.name: shootingprofessional

traits.description: Brave {PAWN_nameDef}, born with impossible strength and force of will.
traits.name: herculean

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is said to have been dipped in the river of death, {PAWN_pronoun} seems invulnerable in battle.
traits.name: achillean

traits.description: Craftier by far than any mortal man, {PAWN_nameDef} is also a very capable warrior.
traits.name: odyssean

traits.description: Feared by {PAWN_objective} enemies and worshiped by warriors, {PAWN_nameDef} is a bloodthirsty embodiment of war.
traits.name: ares'wrath

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s natural instinct to protect and nurture the people led {PAWN_objective} to champion the hunt.
traits.name: artemis'blessing

traits.description: So wondrous is {PAWN_nameDef} to behold that one look can inspire tears, desire, jealousy, and love.
traits.name: aphrodite'sgrace

traits.description: It is said that {PAWN_nameDef} can leap the space between lightning and thunder, outfox the fox king, and reach tomorrow before the sun.
traits.name: mercury'sblessing

traits.description: Companion to all woodland creatures, both mundane and fantastic, {PAWN_nameDef} protects and nurtures those that respect {PAWN_possessive} domain.
traits.name: sylvanus'blessing

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} crafts with fire and forge as an artist would with paint and brush.
traits.name: vulcan'sfire

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} sends to sleep those who suffer, the new day bringing good health to them.
traits.name: imhotep'swisdom

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] prefers to be up during the night. [PAWN_pronoun] gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h). [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't mind living in darkness.
traits.name: watchman

traits.description: For some unkown reason, [PAWN_nameDef] has become a hot commodity and very expensive.
traits.name: invaluable

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lost [PAWN_possessive] weight in an accident. [PAWN_pronoun] hardly needs food, but [PAWN_pronoun] still will get hurt or sick.
traits.name: losequality

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has congenital immunodeficiency. So it's difficult for [PAWN_objective] to fight with diseases.
traits.name: lowimmunity

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at using long-range weapons to support [PAWN_possessive] teammates. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll be confidence if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: coverfire

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is so flexible that [PAWN_pronoun] fights well. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll be so brave while wounded.
traits.name: fighter

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has the skill to build a house and can also make some furniture.
traits.name: plasterer

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at digging and drilling. [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't mind eating on the ground or living in darkness.
traits.name: miner

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at cooking.
traits.name: goodcooking
stats: -10.00% Food poison chance (chance to poison a meal)

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at farming and harvesting crops. [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't mind eating on the ground.
traits.name: farmer

traits.description: Tame and train animals is easy for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] is also good at gathering resources from animals. [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't mind living in the wild.
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at making weapons and equipment.
traits.name: blacksmith

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at artistic creation.
traits.name: artist

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at nursing. [PAWN_pronoun] can keep calm beside the corpse.
traits.name: nurse

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is clever at understanding and making judgements about a situation. Talking is [PAWN_possessive] weapon.
traits.name: shrewd

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is passionate about researching and inventing things.
traits.name: inventor

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a friendly and warm person. Everyone thinks that chatting with [PAWN_objective] is very happy.
traits.name: enthusiasm

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] always come forward in danger. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll be so brave while wounded or in sick.
traits.name: brave

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a strongman. [PAWN_pronoun]can carry more and recovers faster.
traits.name: strong

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is focused on [PAWN_possessive] work. [PAWN_possessive] efficiency is very high.
traits.name: earnest

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at crafting.
traits.name: craftsman

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at logging and hauling. [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't mind eating on the ground.
traits.name: lumberjack

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at working in unskilled jobs.
traits.name: handyman

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is friendly to people who are discriminated against.
traits.name: universallove

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] eats less than others. While [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't mind wearing ratty or tattered clothes.
traits.name: frugal

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s voice is clear and pleasant. This predisposes others to like [PAWN_objective].
traits.name: nicevoice

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an enviable body that makes [PAWN_objective] very popular.
traits.name: nicebody

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at hunting.
traits.name: hunter

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at healing. [PAWN_pronoun] can keep calm beside the corpse.
traits.name: doctor

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at winemaking.
traits.name: winemaker

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an increased resistance to the ebb and flow of mana which allows [PAWN_objective] to hold an additional 40 mana, but reduces [PAWN_possessive] mana regeneration by 20%.

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] excels at combat arts and is able to execute combat maneuvers 40% more frequently, however, [PAWN_possessive] talent has fostered an arrogant attitude that reduces [PAWN_possessive] experience gain by 25% and causes other fighters to dislike [PAWN_objective].

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has accepted that death is another part of life and doesn't get upset when learning about a dead ally or seeing one of the undead.

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been reanimated as an undead.

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a magical gift. [PAWN_pronoun] can harness this gift to become a mage by studying the mysterious secrets within an arcane script.
traits.name: magicallygifted

traits.description:
[PAWN_nameDef] is a wanderer; an outcast, half-breed mage class frequently dubbed a hedge-mage. [PAWN_possessive] carefree personality has kept [PAWN_possessive] from developing class abilities. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] has learned to improve on a vast number of utility abilities that allow [PAWN_objective] to adapt to any situation.
		
Wanderers prefer the open road and gain a mood boost for being in a caravan. Caravans with a wanderer will ignore the movement penalties of any world tile. However, their wanderlust will cause them to suffer a mood penalty for remaining at a colony for too long.
traits.name: wanderer

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is attuned with the elements of fire.
traits.name: firemage

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is attuned with the elements of water.
traits.name: icemage

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is attuned with the elements of lightning.
traits.name: lightningmage

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is attuned with arcane forces, interacting directly with raw arcane power to move matter and energy at will.
traits.name: arcanemage

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is attuned with the forces of nature.
traits.name: druid

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been bestowed with divine might and has sworn to uphold justice wherever [PAWN_pronoun] stands.
traits.name: paladin

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is able to summon beings and materialize objects from other planes of existence.
traits.name: summoner

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is attuned with the forces of death.
traits.name: necromancer

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has transformed into a lich, forsaking life in exchange for an power and an immortal existence, choosing to employ undead for menial tasks.
traits.name: lich

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is attuned with the forces of life and healing and has taken a vow against harming others.
traits.name: priest

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a natural entertainer, able to lighten the mood and lift the spirits of everyone around [PAWN_objective].
traits.name: entertainer

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a performer; expanding on natural talent, [PAWN_pronoun] has begun to take an conscious role to improve the mood of other colonists.
traits.name: performer

traits.description: Everyone loves being around [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] has talent, wit and skill in many forms of entertainment and is able to make a personal connection with almost everyone.
traits.name: minstrel

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a master entertainer. Sharp wit, deft hands, and dry humor are [PAWN_possessive] weapons, and [PAWN_pronoun] is a master of all [PAWN_possessive] weapons.
traits.name: bard

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a strange genetic strain that grants her enhanced physical attributes. She is also extremely attractive with an exotic facial structure that captures the eye. A succubus is more likely to exploit her physical advantages and have others do her work for her. [PAWN_possessive] succubus charm has its disadvantages and can cause some to become jealous and even despise [PAWN_objective].
traits.name: succubus

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Warlock - able to manifest physical and demonic forces using his unique access to arcane power. The warlock shares the same genetic mixture as a succubus, but as a male, [PAWN_pronoun] is affected with mental enhancements that include clairvoyance and telekineses. The warlock can occasionally affect the outcome of a social interaction using their mental capabilities, regardless of how the interaction actually occurred.
traits.name: warlock

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is attuned with the earth and natural order, drawing power from the physical realm and intertwining it with arcane energy. [PAWN_pronoun] is capable of reinforcing physical elements, and bending them, as [PAWN_pronoun] needs.
traits.name: geomancer

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to see magic and science as two parts of the same force and is able to use arcane power to interface directly with components of technology. [PAWN_pronoun] is capable of manipulating objects with advanced mechanics, electronics, or computing it to achieve [PAWN_possessive] goals, but has difficulty interacting with biological systems.
traits.name: technomancer

traits.description:
[PAWN_nameDef] is a blood mage and has consigned to the dark art of manipulating the life blood of living things as a means of increasing [PAWN_possessive] power.

As a blood mage, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to control the life force within and command it to [PAWN_possessive] will. [PAWN_possessive] connection to life makes it easier to associate with other living things, but doesn't appreciate effort without immediate results.
traits.name: bloodmage

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an enchanter, attuned to the composition of matter and materials. [PAWN_pronoun] can manipulate matter to [PAWN_possessive] will, frequently in unnatural ways, and [PAWN_possessive] powers of transmutation can be permanent when sufficient effort is applied.
traits.name: enchanter

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a chronomancer. Through arcane sight, [PAWN_pronoun] is able to view reality as it once was and as it could be, and can manipulate objects between those realities.
traits.name: chronomancer

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has rejected all predefined magic paths and refuses to attribute objective reality in [PAWN_possessive] search for power; there are no truths, all magic is permitted. This tradition has enabled [PAWN_nameDef] to learn any type of magic, although [PAWN_pronoun] will never master any.
traits.name: chaosmage

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a half-breed demon with an affinity for shadow magic. [PAWN_pronoun] has developed [PAWN_possessive] unique talents through combat training and physical conditioning making [PAWN_objective] the perfect assassin.
traits.name: shadow

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a brightmage, able to harness the powers of light to purge evil. [PAWN_pronoun] approaches any task with an unrivaled fervor that usually places [PAWN_objective] at the forefront. Being a Brightmage introduces a dependency on the sun and light, because of this, [PAWN_nameDef] has developed an intense hatred for shadowy and dark caricatures.
traits.name: brightmage

traits.description: *not implemented, do not use* Shamans take a more harmonious approach to arcane powers than most mages, choosing to pursue a path that works with the ebb and flow of magic to offset or enhance the natural order. [PAWN_nameDef] is kin to the spirit realm and more attuned to nature.
traits.name: shaman

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is physically adept and has potential to learn special combat forms.
traits.name: physicallyadept

traits.description:
[PAWN_nameDef] is a wayfarer; an self-disciplined fighter that excels at tricks and dirty fighting. [PAWN_possessive] carefree personality has kept [PAWN_objective] from developing class abilities. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] has learned to improve a vast number of utility abilities that allow [PAWN_objective] to adapt to any situation.

Wayfarers prefer the open road and will gain a mood boost for being in a caravan, and any caravan with a wayfarer will travel 25% faster. However, wayfarers will suffer a mood penalty if they remain at colony for too long.
traits.name: wayfarer

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has learned how to train the Gladiator combat style.
traits.name: gladiator

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a trained woodsman; preferring the silence and lethality of a bow and armed with field-craft and cunning, [PAWN_pronoun] is prepared to defend [PAWN_possessive] land from invaders.
traits.name: woodsman

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a hunter; [PAWN_pronoun] employs field-craft, cunning, and skill with a bow to defend [PAWN_possessive] land from invaders.
traits.name: hunter

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a scout; comfortable in the wilds, and relied upon to be the eyes and ears of a colony. [PAWN_pronoun] employs expertise in field-craft, cunning, and the bow to defend [PAWN_possessive] land from invaders.
traits.name: scout

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a ranger; master of the wilds.  [PAWN_pronoun] is a master of [PAWN_possessive] craft and defender of [PAWN_possessive] land.
traits.name: ranger

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has trained to become a sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat. Training to become a sniper has caused some colonists to be uncomfortable around [PAWN_objective], not that [PAWN_pronoun] cares.
traits.name: sharpshooter

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has trained to become a sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat. Becoming a sniper has caused [PAWN_objective] to become distanced from other colonists and somewhat unapproachable, not that [PAWN_pronoun] cares.
traits.name: sniper

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a master sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat. Being a sniper has made [PAWN_objective] avoid other colonists, not that they care.
traits.name: mastersniper

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a legendary sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat.  Other colonists avoid eye contact and whisper in corners about how dangerous [PAWN_pronoun] is and that suits [PAWN_objective] just fine.
traits.name: legendarysniper

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is training to become a master of the blade and excels at fighting in melee combat.
traits.name: bladesman

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has trained to become a sword master, dangerously skilled in melee combat.
traits.name: blademaster

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a blade dancer, highly skilled in melee combat.  Watching [PAWN_objective] fight is like watching a dance, every action precise and flawless as it flows from one form into another.
traits.name: bladedancer

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has become a legend, [PAWN_possessive] skill in melee combat is is known across the world. [PAWN_possessive] skill in combat makes it look as if each movement, each strike, is merely a stitch in a tapestry that depicts [PAWN_possessive] victory.
traits.name: legendarybladedancer

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a master of disguise and imitation; able to manipulate and capture the muscle and mental actions of another and release it as their own.
traits.name: faceless

traits.description:
[PAWN_nameDef] is a Psionic - able to manifest mental willpower into raw energy without the use of a psychic amplifier. [PAWN_pronoun] is able to project psionic energy but finds it easier and more efficient to apply it as an extension and augmentation of [PAWN_possessive] body. For this reason, [PAWN_pronoun] prefers to be free of encumbering weapons.

[PAWN_nameDef] has become less social since developing psionic powers since [PAWN_objective] can perform any task on [PAWN_possessive] own and can do without the jealousy of others.

*The regeneration rate of psionic energy is based on psychic sensitivity - reducing sensitivity to 0 will prevent psionic energy from regenerating.
traits.name: psionic

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Death Knight - harbinger of doom and a representative of the ever approaching inevitability of death and decay. [PAWN_possessive] solemn attitude makes most pawns uneasy and even fewer approve of [PAWN_possessive] methods.
traits.name: deathknight

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Monk, dedicated to mastering Chi - the energy that connects all life in the universe. [PAWN_pronoun] harnesses Chi to create magical effects and exceed [PAWN_possessive] physical capabilities. [PAWN_nameDef] is also able to disrupt the Chi in others, affecting their command over spells and abilities.
traits.name: monk

traits.description: As a Commander, [PAWN_nameDef] exhibits a charismatic personality and stalwart presence that makes other pawns want to follow [PAWN_possessive] lead. Commander's utilize the weight of their presence to inspire nearby pawns, and when that's not enough, they can issue orders that drive their followers to victory. Because [PAWN_nameDef] is used to everyone doing [PAWN_possessive] bidding, [PAWN_pronoun] considers menial tasks beneath [PAWN_possessive] status, and is generally a lackluster worker.
traits.name: commander

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a highly trained Soldier, specializing in pistol, shotgun, or rifle weapons. [PAWN_possessive] weapon specialization is augmented by a standard set of combat training. Super Soldiers are trained to be aggressive and consider violence the natural solution to any argument.
traits.name: supersoldier

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has the ability to rebound projectiles.
traits.name: masterofblade

traits.description: NAME is an artificially simulated recreation of a person who died.
traits.name: holographic

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} under went reconditioning at some point but something went wrong. The failed procedure left them with reduced brain fuction. Good thing they can be reconditioned to forget about all that.
traits.name: botchedconditioning

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} under went reconditioning at some point but something went wrong, in a good way. What ever happened seemed to have positive effects on they, improveing brain functions. Guess this is just one of those happy accidents.
traits.name: luckybotchedconditioning

traits.description: NAME is an robot. As a robot HE is a bit faster and not really sensible for psychic phenomena.
traits.name: robot

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the solitude and tranquility inherent to long fishing sessions. {PAWN_pronoun} will prefer fishing above other activities.
traits.name: fisherman
